---
title: "Regulatory Framework & Roles"
---

## What “Compliance” Means Operationally
Compliance is demonstrated through:
- Correct approvals before study activities occur
- Accurate delegation and training for staff performing trial tasks
- Controlled versions of essential documents
- Traceable decisions and corrective actions (audit trail)

## CRA Role vs Site Role (Quick Map)

| Area | Site Owns | CRA Verifies / Oversees |
|---|---|---|
| IRB submissions | Submission content/timing | Approval validity; no activity before approval |
| Informed consent | Consent process + documentation | Version control; process adherence; documentation completeness |
| Delegation | Assigning tasks | Alignment to qualifications + training |
| Essential docs | Maintenance of site reg binder | Completeness; consistency; filing timeliness |
| TMF | Sponsor/CRO filing | Completeness/QC; reconciliation with site docs |
